Name: RecordLayoutSchemeName
Description: A name for the RecordLayoutScheme. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat the element to express names with different content, for example different names for different systems.

Name: Label
Description: A display label for the RecordLayoutScheme. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content. Repeat for labels with different content, for example, labels with differing length limitations.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the RecordLayoutScheme. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content.

Name: RecordLayoutSchemeReference
Description: Reference to an existing RecordLayoutScheme for inclusion.

Name: RecordLayoutReference
Description: This is the head of a substitution group and may be replaced by any member of the group. Describes the contents and physical layout of a record of data. Different members of the substitution group support different storage formats as well as data records with and without NCube structures.

Name: RecordLayoutGroupReference
Description: Describes a group of RecordLayout descriptions for administrative or conceptual purposes.
